title: pocketmine-mp开不了服
txt_content:
为什么开不了pm服务器，重下pm也没用，求解，一开服就这样：[PocketMine] Server is starting...[PocketMine] Server was started.
[Server] Failed loading /home/peratx/桌面/php-build-scripts-php7/bin/php7/lib/php/extensions/no-debug-zts-20151012/opcache.so: Dynamic loading not supported
[PocketMine] Server was stopped.

replies.author: 789lll321
replies.txt_content: 核心文件加载不支持，是不是demo版本啊

b789lll321 发表于 2018-2-18 18:18
核心文件加载不支持，是不是demo版本啊
